title: League of Legends previous FPS Lag
body: Hello there fellow Summoners, for the last couple of days/patches I've been experiencing some FPS lag. Note that the last couple of weeks I've been running a steady 120 fps at full graphics. I just want to know if anyone has also been confronted by this problem. Currently I have 40-50 fps which is good but still lags for some reason. NOTE: Ping is 20 as well as how I have a solid gaming laptop. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hello War Prepared!

Dropping that extreme of FPS does sound incredibly odd.  It may have been due to something with the texture updates with SRU, but I would like to look at more common causes for such a drop of FPS.  To that end, can you reply back and attach the following logs?

1) [Dxdiag information](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5 )

2) [Your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt)](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7 )
My FPS before patch 5.6 was steady, now, is terrible, freeze for 2 seconds and go back.

> [{quoted}](name=SirDevilT,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nH8G2d5V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-25T18:54:31.809+0000)
>
> My FPS before patch 5.6 was steady, now, is terrible, freeze for 2 seconds and go back.

Wanted to pop in and say that I'm having this problem. Had no issues on 5.5, but after updating to 5.6, I'm getting frameskips/minifreezes what feels like once every ten seconds (or worse). I've repaired the installation, restarted, made various adjustments to the graphics settings in game and my video card driver settings and then tested them in customs, and... well, I'm just having no luck fixing it no matter what I try. It's really hurting my ability to enjoy the game.

same issue for me. i was averaging around 20 fps before the patch. after the patch, the game never goes over 4 fps. happens on both howling abyss and summoner's rift. i have everything set to very low as well.
I get terrible FPS drops in the fountain.  My computer can run pretty much anything maxed out and I didn't have this problem previous to I want to say 5.5.
I was fine for one game then random fps drops the next
the new map is a coded terribly, specific abiltiies like rumbles ultimate, fighting drag/baron, all causes massive performance issues
